message: part of my thinking is that the evolution of HTML5 + mobile will result in apps that are interesting combinations of native and web apps
Yep. Check out this from our blog. http://blog.lavablast.com/post/2011/05/24/Re-skin-your-existing-web-app-using-jQuery-Mobile.aspx
How anyone played with JQuery Mobile?  There are lots of quirks that aren't explained very well in the docs.
Etienne (@etiennet) ran into tons of such undocumented quirks - he knows some of them (I don't).
I have been playing with it a bit more in the last week --- in the same context as my django-cloud-mobile blog posts; that is an important aspect; mobile friendly site + mobile API etc.
good article Jason. I did more on on the custom JavaScript side that got me in trouble.
